name: Marry Me Chicken Pasta
description: This is the little black dress of pasta dishes: it can be dressed up for a romantic date night or dressed down for a regular weekday dinner. Whip up a quick salad while things are cooking on the stovetop and you’ll have a complete meal in a snap. More time to plan the honeymoon!
preparation: Cook pasta in large pot according to package directions. Drain.
Meanwhile, in a bowl, whisk seasoning with cream and water. Set aside.
Chop chicken into bite-size pieces. Heat oil in Sauté Pan over medium-high heat. Add chicken; stir-fry until cooked, about 5–7 min.
Stir reserved seasoning mixture, cooked pasta, and tomatoes into pan. Bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat to low, and let simmer 1 min, or until sauce is thickened. Add spinach; stir until wilted.
tips: Level up! Stir in some goat or feta cheese to the pasta before serving.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups leafy greens and 1 tbsp Epicure Dressing.

products.name: Marry Me Chicken Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: While we can’t guarantee a marriage proposal following this meal, we are certain Marry Me Chicken is going to be a big part of your life! This one-pan meal is creamy and decadent, with bursts of tomato flavour and notes of basil in every bite. It’s perfect for special occasions, holiday feasts, or weeknight dinners when you want to feel a little fancy without spending hours in the kitchen—in fact it’s ready in 15 minutes!
